Mecha-Naruto uses his Rasengan which is a light purple colour after propelling itself towards the opponent. As the Rasengan hits the opponent, Mecha-Naruto "shoots" his hand along with the Rasengan, further damaging the opponent.

[[pl:Roketto Rasengan]]
[[fr:Roquette Tourbillonnante]]
